panels.title: Build Success Rate
panels.query: SELECT (successful_builds * 100.0 / total_builds) FROM daily_metrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Build Latency Trend
panels.query: SELECT date, avg_latency_ms FROM daily_metrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 30

panels.title: Daily Build Count
panels.query: SELECT date, total_builds, successful_builds, failed_builds FROM daily_metrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 14

panels.title: Cumulative Costs
panels.query: SELECT date, SUM(total_cost_usd) OVER (ORDER BY date) as cumulative_cost FROM daily_metrics

panels.title: Error Distribution
panels.query: SELECT build_status, COUNT(*) FROM telemetry GROUP BY build_status

panels.title: AI Trust Scores
panels.query: SELECT ai_id, weight, updated_at FROM ai_weights ORDER BY weight DESC
